snippet: The men were convicted with scores of others of plotting a coup in the Ergenekon case, which the government of Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan used to break the political power of Turkey’s military.
abstract: Turkish court orders the release of 19 men convicted with scores of others of plotting a coup in the controversial Ergenekon case, which Prime Min Recep Tayyip Erdogan's government used to break the political power of country's military.
lead_paragraph: The men were convicted with scores of others of plotting a coup in the Ergenekon case, which the government of Prime Minister Recep Tayyip Erdogan used to break the political power of Turkey’s military.

headline.main: Turkish Court Orders Release of 19 More in Plot Case
headline.print_headline: Turkey: More Released in Plot Case
